events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but the package has still not arrived and the tracking information hasn’t updated.
The issue is identified as a delivery delay based on the customer’s complaint about late shipment and tracking problems.
The support case has been assigned to Agent Lisa for follow-up on the delayed delivery complaint.
Hello, I’m Lisa from customer support. I understand your package is delayed. I’m here to assist you and find out what’s happening.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can check the status with our delivery partner?
Sure, my order number is 12345678 and the shipping address is 45 Elm Street, Springfield.
I contacted the courier service and they confirmed an unexpected delay due to high volume. We expect your package to arrive within the next 3 business days.
Thank you for the update. I’m disappointed but appreciate that you checked with the courier.
We will monitor your shipment’s progress and keep you informed. Please reach out if you don’t receive the package in 3 days.
Just checking in to see if your package arrived as expected. We want to ensure your delivery experience is satisfactory.
Yes, the package arrived this afternoon. Everything is in order now. Thanks for your help!
We’re glad your package has arrived safely. Thank you for contacting support, and have a great day!
